metaclasses module¶

class metaclasses.ClientVerifier(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Bases: type

Metaclass to check client class. Checks if there is no calls of accept() and listen() and socket objet is not created inside class.

class metaclasses.ServerVerifier(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Bases: type

Metaclass to check server class. Checks if connect() is not called and that TCP protocol is used
